{{Blessing of the Abyssal Moon
|name       = Chiliastic
|phase      = Waxing
|image      = Spiral Abyss Blessing 29.png
|details    =
<li>After the challenge begins, when a character's Elemental Energy is 100%, they will gain 1 stack of Auspice every second. Max 10 stacks. When this character unleashes their Elemental Burst, all Auspice stacks will be cleared, and the DMG dealt by this character will be increased by 5% for each stack cleared for the next 10s. While the character is enjoying the DMG Bonus gained via this method, they cannot gain any more stacks.</li>
|time_start = 2021-11-01 04:00:00
|time_end   = 2021-11-16 03:59:59
